title: go get should support -o flag
body:
Hello,


Currently if you run " go get -o demo code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/goimports
" it will fail because " -o " is not part of the build arguments of go
build but rather it's specific to " go get ".
While I do understand the cause, I also believe that it would be nice to be able to
specify the output path to " go get ".


Thank you.
